Rasmus Johannesson is a member of the firm’s Corporate Commercial and IT/Tech practice groups, and has extensive experience in assisting Swedish and foreign clients in legally complex assignments where contract law issues arise, with a particular focus on strategic/industrial cooperations, joint ventures, outsourcing projects, IT and tech related agreements, R&D, licensing, purchase and service agreements as well as sales and distribution agreements.

Rasmus regularly assists the firm’s clients in connection with a variety of contract law issues and has extensive experience in reviewing, drafting and negotiating complex agreements, as well as handling issues that arise during the contract period and the ongoing contract administration. Rasmus also has broad experience of assisting clients in M&A transactions and carve-outs/separations.

In addition, Rasmus regularly lectures to students at the Faculty of Law at Lund University in areas such as international sales law.
